question: What is the distribution of flight durations across different aircraft models?
query:
SELECT a.model,
       COUNT(*) AS flight_count,
       MIN(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM f.scheduled_arrival - f.scheduled_departure)) AS min_duration,
       MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM f.scheduled_arrival - f.scheduled_departure)) AS max_duration,
       AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM f.scheduled_arrival - f.scheduled_departure)) AS avg_duration,
       STDDEV(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM f.scheduled_arrival - f.scheduled_departure)) AS stddev_duration
FROM postgres_air.flight AS f
JOIN postgres_air.aircraft AS a
  ON f.aircraft_code = a.code
GROUP BY a.model
ORDER BY a.model;
